Coding

Coding related materials.

As a digital historian, much of my work involves writing code, whether for teaching or my research. You can find my GitHub profile and some of my most active repositories on this page, as well as my most active organizations. One small note is that for a few years my local GitHub configuration was not correct, so you may come across a ghost Zoe LeBlanc account. I have since fixed this, but it means that some of my commits and activity will not show up on my main account.

GitHub Repositories

GitHub Organizations

  1. Technical Lead for the Programming Historian https://github.com/programminghistorian
  2. PI of Informing the Third World https://github.com/Informing-The-Third-World
  3. Co-PI of Coding DH with Jeri Wieringa https://github.com/CodingDH
  4. Co-PI of NANReP with Maurice Labelle, Cindy Ewing, and Heidi Tworek https://github.com/NANReP
  5. Co-PI of CARTi with Gabi Kirilloff, John R. Ladd, Matt Lavin, Anna Preus, and Melanie Walsh https://github.com/CA-Research-and-Teaching
